text: Giorgio Bernini (9 November 1928 – 21 October 2020) was an Italian jurist, academic and politician. He was the father of Anna Maria Bernini. Bernini was born in Bologna, Italy. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1994 to 1996. Bernini died on 21 October 2020 in Bologna at the age of 91.Morto Giorgio Bernini, padre della senatrice di Forza Italia Anna Maria. Fu giurista all’Onu e ministro nel primo governo Berlusconi ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian educators Category:Italian judges Category:People from Bologna Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna
title: Giorgio Bernini
